question: Which passengers have flown on the same flight more than three times in 2024?
query:
SELECT p.passenger_id, p.first_name, p.last_name, f.flight_no, COUNT(*) AS flight_count
FROM postgres_air.boarding_pass bp
JOIN postgres_air.booking_leg bl ON bp.booking_leg_id = bl.booking_leg_id
JOIN postgres_air.flight f ON bl.flight_id = f.flight_id
JOIN postgres_air.passenger p ON bp.passenger_id = p.passenger_id
WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM f.scheduled_departure) = 2024
GROUP BY p.passenger_id, p.first_name, p.last_name, f.flight_no
HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
